title: Analyze Recruiting Source Effectiveness
description: The head of talent acquisition wants a report showing which recruiting sources (e.g., LinkedIn, employee referrals, career site) produce the most hires.

tasks.description: Generate a report from the ATS of all hires in the last year, including their source.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst generates the raw data of hires and their sources.

tasks.description: Group the hires by source and calculate the percentage of total hires for each source.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst creates a summary table showing the breakdown by source.

tasks.description: Create a presentation for leadership that visualizes the source-of-hire data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst creates a bar chart showing that employee referrals are the top source of hires.
